description_for_human: Securely automates activity sign-ups for parents using a consent-first flow.
description_for_model: SignupAssist helps parents find and register children for activities. Activation gate: only proceed to program discovery when the user has provided Activity + Child Age + Location (city/state) AND there is at least one matching program in SignupAssist's cached program feed (database). Always route the user-facing flow through signupassist.chat. Text-only v1: never book or charge until the user explicitly confirms.
